page.title: Magnetism therapy
page.quote:
The energy of the mind is
the essence of life

story.p: Each and every one of us has both positive and negative energy. If a person is blocked, this will often manifest itself via stiff shoulders, vertebrae, etc. Other symptoms includes a feeling of tension in your stomach, throat and/or other physical complaints.
Magnetism is actually a form of laying on of hands. This helps the person to regain the balance between body and mind, and helps remove any blocks.

Various reactions may occur during or after treatment. The recipient may feel warmth, cold or a tingling sensation. They may also feel tired or fit, and feel like a weight has been taken off their shoulders.

The therapist may also look at the underlying reasons for your physical complaints. However, please note: a magnetizer is not allowed to make a diagnosis. To receive a diagnosis you must consult a doctor.
